name: FlyingFun
description:
a low effort flying game I made for the Low Effort 13 Jam..

I made it using UE's flying template, basically I just deleted the existing floors from the template and added some other platforms that you can fly over/around(would've made it so you can land and pick up stuff to transport to other platforms, but it was too much effort), original idea was to transport items between space stations.. I would have modeled a ship but too much effort, so I just used the UFO from the template..

A/D - Left and Right

W - pitch down

S - Pitch Up

Shift - Accelerate

Ctrl - Decelerate

Esc - Quit

Disclaimer: I cannot refund/return any time you waste in this game, please don't ask.
